buddy_profile.name: Caroline Struye
buddy_profile.title: Singapore Country Director - Muuse
buddy_profile.introduction: I am French, recently arrived in Singapore after 14 years of international experience across Europe and Canada. I spent 14 years in the aeronautical industry before joining a start up offering reusable packaging for the Food & Beverage industry. Passionate by nature, I am always enthusiast to meet new people, share and learn also more.

background.location_transition: Recently arrived in Singapore after 14 years across Europe and Canada
background.current_focus: Start-up offering reusable packaging for Food & Beverage industry

top_3_advice: Use this wonderful Network. It can give you much more than what you suspect.
buddy_profile.how_to_help: Engage the conversation :) I can share my experience at personal level or advise at profesionnal level.

sustainability_awakening.event: Worldwide summit of aeronautics logistics in Montreal
sustainability_awakening.moment: When the Head of Procurement of Bombardier challenged an entrepreneur offering sustainable aircraft materials by asking 'why shall we care about recycled material when we are the biggest polluters?'
sustainability_awakening.realization: Had the 'Declic' - realized need to join biggest players to change industry from inside

professional_responsibilities.past: Managed environmental roadmap of Waste and Water Management at European level for Airbus Defence & Space, covering all production & office scope
professional_responsibilities.current: Offer solution to divert waste from single use packaging to end up into landfills

buddy_profile.challenges_and_solutions: Human is by definition resistant to change, unless we see an individual and personal advantage to it. It's all about resilience, persuasion et data. Your case get more complicating when the business case is not profitable, and it s not that often profitable on short term when you talk about sustainability.

company_details.name: Muuse
company_details.focus: Reusable packaging for Food & Beverage industry
company_details.mission: Divert waste from single-use packaging ending up in landfills
